citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:35 PM on 17-
May-2022.
The inspector knocked on the door of the house, called the phone number and left a message, sent a text message to the
licensee, and honked the car horn. After waiting 30 minutes the inspector left the facility.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 12:35 PM on 17-
May-2022. 
 
The inspector knocked on the door of the house, called the phone number and left a message, sent a text message to the 
licensee, and honked the car horn.  After waiting 30 minutes the inspector left the facility. 
 
 
 
End Section
